state_description: This screen prompts the user to quit certain applications to clean related system junk effectively. It lists applications that should be closed and provides options to quit them individually or all at once.

enables.name: Quit Code
enables.description: Quit the 'Code' application to proceed with cleaning its related items.

enables.name: Quit Claude
enables.description: Quit the 'Claude' application to proceed with cleaning its related items.

enables.name: Quit Safari
enables.description: Quit the 'Safari' application to proceed with cleaning its related items.

enables.name: Ignore
enables.description: Ignore the prompt and proceed without quitting the applications.

enables.name: Quit All
enables.description: Quit all listed applications to proceed with cleaning their related items.
